snippet.title: Goalkeeper VR Challenge - Trailer [VR, HTC Vive]
snippet.description:
Get it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/949860/Goalkeeper_VR_Challenge/

VR Goalkeeper challenge is an immersive virtual reality sports-action game, enabling the player to step into the shoes of a soccer goalkeeper. The game offers an actual physical workout, as preventing balls from scoring can become a challenging task, especially for the folk with competitive streak in them.

AWESOME FEATURES INCLUDE:
- Fast paced gameplay
- 12 different game modes, tweaking gameplay in fun and surprising ways.
- Fully dynamic lighting for realistic look and feel
- Ability to control difficulty of the game
- Leaderboards for score tracking and competition
- Achievements as a little bonus treat
- Compatibility with HTC Vive and Oculus Rift

Developer: http://www.sneakybox-studios.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SneakyBox/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/sneakybox
